game_description: Immerse into the fantasy world inhabited by different creatures. Use magical weaponry to fight an army of Orks. Explore more locations and improve your skills. Meet new friends who will join you on a journey and run a joint attack on the final boss.
review_1: I think it's very good. In addition, I would like you to add an online system, My imagination is standing on a tower and knocking down the opponent's enemies, so the team with the higher points wins. I think solo or trio would be fine. Also, since this is a game that uses a bow, please make the settings a little more detailed.
